title: Why is the co-ed K-pop group KARD so underrated? They're so much better than BTS and any other K-Pop group. - Quora

response.answer_text: Honestly, it's all subjective. You may think KARD is superior, while others prefer BTS, NCT, TWICE, Red Velvet, etc. You can’t just say “KARD is better” or “so and so is better”. It's all about the opinion. Now, statistics. I’ve only gotten into KARD recently (I ordered the Big Tiddie Gang hoodie CANNOT wait for it to arrive help ashdkajk), and as far as I remember, KARD debuted in 2017. Their company isn’t well known compared to the Big Three (or Four, if you will): DSP Media. I literally do not know any group from that company other than KARD. So, if you compare them to BTS or Blackpink (for example), both of those groups already have an advantage of (1) longer time/experience; (2) a more well-known company; (3) their fandom isn't as big, simple as that. There are SO MANY groups with SO MANY bops, yet do they get the hype they deserve? No. Are there groups who don’t deserve the immense hype they have as of now? Yes. Life isn’t fair, and It sucks. We also have to take into account there are FOUR members, two males, two females. As a kpop fan, (me, as an example), I stan more male idol groups, while I like to listen to girl groups’ songs individually. There are people who prefer girl groups over guy groups, and vice versa, while KARD falls in the middle of that whole gist. Not to mention how KARD members aren’t as conservative- with the BTG meme, lots of English, etc, their Korean fandom probably isn't as big as they deserve. An idol (group) gets fame/success not just by themselves. Without their fans support, how can they sell their albums, have concerts, and who would they interact with? If you want more people to stan KARD (or any group, really), as a fan, you should work hard for them to be known, as well. Start a fan account! Talk about them casually to your family members, or recommend some songs you think your friends may like. The bare minimum you can do for your idol (group) is to stream, stream, stream! Stream on Spotify, apple music, youtube, your pick! The idol cannot control everything. It is also the fans’ job, too. All in all, it’s all subjective, but I added some factors that might contribute to why KARD doesn’t get the recognition they deserve, hope it helps!
